subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: A good deed by:  Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: black bear hollow
full_text:
Exactly. Who knows? We can only go on what "they" tell us. They lie.  
Sometimes not. I've seen quite a few cases where grieving parents  
swear they are talking to their "dead" child and others listening to  
their recording don't think so, but the entity continues to play that  
roll as they are getting a lot of attention (energy) by claiming to be  
the child.

All I know is I'm talking to someone/something. Who or what remains a  
mystery.

w.
On Aug 18, 2008, at 2:27 PM, threadsintyme@... wrote:

> This then raises all sorts of questions, like, how do you know WHICH  
> group you could be listening to?
>
> OY...more questions that I got brains!! LOL
>
> Al
>
